verses.verse: I am sought <WH1875> of them that asked <WH7592> not for me; I am found <WH4672> of them that sought <WH1245> me not: I said, <WH559> Behold <WH2009> me, behold <WH2009> me, to a nation <WH1471> that was not called <WH7121> by my name. <WH8034>

I have spread <WH6566> out my hands <WH3027> all <WH3605> the day <WH3117> to a rebellious <WH5637> people, <WH5971> which walks <WH1980> in a way <WH1870> that was not good, <WH2896> after <WH310> their own thoughts; <WH4284>

A people <WH5971> that provokes me to anger <WH3707> continually <WH8548> to my face; <WH6440> that sacrifices <WH2076> in gardens, <WH1593> and burns <WH6999> incense <WH6999> on altars of brick; <WH3843>

Which remain <WH3427> among the graves, <WH6913> and lodge <WH3885> in the monuments, <WH5341> which eat <WH398> swine's <WH2386> flesh, <WH1320> and broth <WH6564> of abominable <WH6292> things is in their vessels; <WH3627>

Which say, <WH559> Stand <WH7126> by yourself, come <WH5066> not near <WH5066> to me; for I am holier <WH6942> than you. These <WH428> are a smoke <WH6227> in my nose, <WH639> a fire <WH784> that burns <WH3344> all <WH3605> the day. <WH3117>
Behold, <WH2009> it is written <WH3789> before <WH6440> me: I will not keep silence, <WH2814> but will recompense, <WH7999> even recompense <WH7999> into <WH5921> their bosom, <WH2436>

Your iniquities, <WH5771> and the iniquities <WH5771> of your fathers <WH1> together, <WH3162> said <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> have burned <WH6999> incense <WH6999> on the mountains, <WH2022> and blasphemed <WH2778> me on the hills: <WH1389> therefore will I measure <WH4058> their former <WH7223> work <WH6468> into <WH5921> their bosom. <WH2436>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> As the new <WH8492> wine <WH8492> is found <WH4672> in the cluster, <WH811> and one said, <WH559> Destroy <WH7843> it not; for a blessing <WH1293> is in it: so <WH3651> will I do <WH6213> for my servants' <WH5650> sakes, <WH4616> that I may not destroy <WH7843> them all. <WH3605>

And I will bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> a seed <WH2233> out of Jacob, <WH3290> and out of Judah <WH3063> an inheritor <WH3423> of my mountains: <WH2022> and my elect <WH972> shall inherit <WH3423> it, and my servants <WH5650> shall dwell <WH7931> there. <WH8033>

And Sharon <WH8289> shall be a fold <WH5116> of flocks, <WH6629> and the valley <WH6010> of Achor <WH5911> a place for the herds <WH1241> to lie <WH7258> down <WH7257> in, for my people <WH5971> that have sought <WH1875> me.

But you are they that forsake <WH5800> the LORD, <WH3068> that forget <WH7913> my holy <WH6944> mountain, <WH2022> that prepare <WH6186> a table <WH7979> for that troop, <WH1409> and that furnish <WH4390> the drink <WH4469> offering to that number. <WH4507>

Therefore will I number <WH4487> you to the sword, <WH2719> and you shall all <WH3605> bow <WH3766> down <WH3766> to the slaughter: <WH2874> because <WH3282> when I called, <WH7121> you did not answer; <WH6030> when I spoke, <WH1696> you did not hear; <WH8085> but did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> before my eyes, <WH5869> and did <WH6213> choose <WH977> that wherein <WH834> I delighted <WH2654> not.

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> my servants <WH5650> shall eat, <WH398> but you shall be hungry: <WH7456> behold, <WH2009> my servants <WH5650> shall drink, <WH8354> but you shall be thirsty: <WH6770> behold, <WH2009> my servants <WH5650> shall rejoice, <WH8055> but you shall be ashamed: <WH954>

Behold, <WH2009> my servants <WH5650> shall sing <WH7442> for joy <WH2898> of heart, <WH3820> but you shall cry <WH6817> for sorrow <WH3511> of heart, <WH3820> and shall howl <WH3213> for vexation <WH7667> of spirit. <WH7307>

And you shall leave <WH5117> your name <WH8034> for a curse <WH7621> to my chosen: <WH972> for the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> shall slay <WH4191> you, and call <WH7121> his servants <WH5650> by another <WH312> name: <WH8034>

That he who <WH834> blesses <WH1288> himself in the earth <WH776> shall bless <WH1288> himself in the God <WH430> of truth; <WH543> and he that swears <WH7650> in the earth <WH776> shall swear <WH7650> by the God <WH430> of truth; <WH543> because <WH3588> the former <WH7223> troubles <WH6869> are forgotten, <WH7911> and because <WH3588> they are hid <WH5641> from my eyes. <WH5869>

For, behold, <WH2005> I create <WH1254> new <WH2319> heavens <WH8064> and a new <WH2319> earth: <WH776> and the former <WH7223> shall not be remembered, <WH2142> nor <WH3808> come <WH5927> into <WH5921> mind. <WH3820>

But be you glad <WH7797> and rejoice <WH1523> for ever <WH5703> in that which <WH834> I create: <WH1254> for, behold, <WH2005> I create <WH1254> Jerusalem <WH3389> a rejoicing, <WH1525> and her people <WH5971> a joy. <WH4885>

And I will rejoice <WH1523> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> and joy <WH7797> in my people: <WH5971> and the voice <WH6963> of weeping <WH1065> shall be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> heard <WH8085> in her, nor the voice <WH6963> of crying. <WH2201>

There shall be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> there <WH8033> an infant <WH5764> of days, <WH3117> nor an old <WH2205> man that has not filled <WH4390> his days: <WH3117> for the child <WH5288> shall die <WH4191> an hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old; <WH1121> but the sinner <WH2398> being an hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> shall be accursed. <WH7043>
And they shall build <WH1129> houses, <WH1004> and inhabit <WH3427> them; and they shall plant <WH5193> vineyards, <WH3754> and eat <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> of them.

They shall not build, <WH1129> and another <WH312> inhabit; <WH3427> they shall not plant, <WH5193> and another <WH312> eat: <WH398> for as the days <WH3117> of a tree <WH6086> are the days <WH3117> of my people, <WH5971> and my elect <WH972> shall long enjoy <WH1086> the work <WH4639> of their hands. <WH3027>

They shall not labor <WH3021> in vain, <WH7385> nor <WH3808> bring <WH3205> forth <WH3205> for trouble; <WH928> for they are the seed <WH2233> of the blessed <WH1288> of the LORD, <WH3068> and their offspring <WH6631> with them.
And it shall come <WH1961> to pass, that before <WH2962> they call, <WH7121> I will answer; <WH6030> and while they are yet <WH5750> speaking, <WH1696> I will hear. <WH8085>

The wolf <WH2061> and the lamb <WH2924> shall feed <WH7462> together, <WH259> and the lion <WH738> shall eat <WH398> straw <WH8401> like the bullock: <WH1241> and dust <WH6083> shall be the serpent's <WH5175> meat. <WH3899> They shall not hurt <WH7489> nor <WH3808> destroy <WH7843> in all <WH3605> my holy <WH6944> mountain, <WH2022> said <WH559> the LORD. <WH3068>
